description:
Erode a cifti file.

For all data values that are empty (for label data, unlabeled, for other data, zero), set the surrounding values to empty.  The surrounding values are defined as the immediate neighbors and all values in the same structure within the specified distance (-merged-volume treats all voxels as one structure).

The -*-corrected-areas options are intended for eroding on group average surfaces, but it is only an approximate correction.

direction.title: direction
direction.description: which dimension to dilate along, ROW or COLUMN

surface_distance.title: surface_distance
surface_distance.description: the distance to dilate on surfaces, in mm

volume_distance.title: volume_distance
volume_distance.description: the distance to dilate in the volume, in mm

opt_left_corrected_areas_area_metric.title: opt_left_corrected_areas_area_metric
opt_left_corrected_areas_area_metric.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the left surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the left surface to use

left_surface.description: specify the left surface to use

opt_right_corrected_areas_area_metric.title: opt_right_corrected_areas_area_metric
opt_right_corrected_areas_area_metric.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the right surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the right surface to use

right_surface.description: specify the right surface to use

opt_cerebellum_corrected_areas_area_metr.title: opt_cerebellum_corrected_areas_area_metric
opt_cerebellum_corrected_areas_area_metr.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the cerebellum surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

anyOf.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

cerebellum_surface.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

opt_merged_volume.title: opt_merged_volume
opt_merged_volume.description: treat volume components as if they were a single component
